name: The Mortian 2
author: Sam
description:
The great Abraham Lincoln once said, 'It's real easy getting to another planet if it's right in front of you. But if it's on the opposite side of yours, you're gonna not have fun.'
Suffice to say, we will not be having fun during this race.
briefing: Get to the moon on the other side of the planet by combining your orbital skills with brute force.
